name: Squeen's Adventure: Alien Editon
description:
Squeen's spaceship has crash-landed onto earth, now that wouldn't be so bad, but his phone is dying and he needs to get to a charger quick! Help our alien pal in getting a brand new ship and getting back to his home planet.

This is a full remaster to the original Squeen's Adventure originally uploaded on GameJolt.

Credits:

Game Design - NotTGP

Music Production - ArcadeGamer, NotTGP

Playtesters - TSG_x0, NotTGP
